name: Fleur Hanging light
description:
The Fleur hanging light resembles the early stages of an opening flower with its petals just about to receive the morning light. Its intelligent design gives the impression of movement when fully lit. It can be closed or open to convey different atmospheres of light projection to suit your mood. Its play of shadows can be cast across a vast area. 
Its components lock together easily to produce a sophisticated structure that is captivating and alluring and can be moved in unison to open the light source. 

The Fleur Hanging light comes with an option of *finishings:
• Clear structure with frosted acrylic inserts 
• Frosted structure with open inserts
*(please specify on order)

The Fleur Hanging light comes with an option of *patterns
• Art Deco style #1
• Filigree
• Swirl
• Art Deco style #2
*(please specify on order)

Shade: Integrated in the structure of the lamp
Material: Acrylic 
Thickness: 3mm
Dimensions: H: 228.204mm x W:184.303mm
Delivery: Flat-packed with easy to follow instructions

The Fleur Hanging light comes with fixtures and a plug which is standard in India, but can be customised to fit all international bulb fixtures. 
The Fleur Hanging light does NOT come with a bulb.
